author: .paulharris
content:
I pushed a couple of v1 endpoints to teku. I know the spec isn't really final, I just felt like I needed to work through some of the details, which lead to some of the questions above : https://pegasyseng.github.io/teku/#operation/getV1NodeIdentity
https://pegasyseng.github.io/teku/#operation/getV1NodeVersion
both wrapped in data (which was an early question)
Any feedback would be welcome
